overview: Monica explores a lingering curiosity that leaves her pining for the illustrious and sensual poetess, Nina. After a few cups of liquid courage, Monica works up the courage to approach Nina at a Happy Hour. Clinging to the hope of a bold and new, budding romance, Ninaâ€™s interest in Monica is piqued, despite warnings from her girlfriends. Tensions are high and the energy is kismet, leaving Monica entranced in a lusty dream filled with thrilling possibilities.
tagline: Two shots of liquor. One shot a t love. That's what dreams are made of.
title: Happy Hour
